title: New: FORDE – YDLTF**K
body:
**YDLTF\*\*K** (You Don’t Like To F\*\*K) is the hugely ambitious debut track from London producer / singer _FORDE _(aka Ema Wakeford).

A deeply sensual track, set against the lustful visuals featured below, it’s littered with spoken word verses (“all the rules that you choose to follow / are dated / so dated”) and the occasional intimate sigh / groan. Check it out below.
